script:
1). Are you going to Pittsburgh next week?
No, I'm going to Miami. 
Yes, I've been to Pittsburgh.
Yes, I went there next week.
2). Doesn't Elaine ever take a vacation?
She doesn't take one last year.
She does, but she also works hard. 
No, Elaine does never take vacation.
3). Don't you know Mr. Barr's phone number?
I'm sorry; I don't. 
Of course he does.
I know where the bar is.
